title: How to get more than one correspondent to show in cards?
content: I'm using cards view in threaded mode. When collapsed, the card shows only the name or email of the sender of the first message in the conversation. Is there a way of getting a list of all correspondents to show? Or at least, to show the sender of the last message? What is the logic behind the folder selection when I select Save or Save All?
